theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory emphasizes senescent cells and SASP as key drivers of chronic inflammation and aging, linking multiple mechanisms including mitochondrial dysfunction and immune deregulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent cells releasing SASP factors causing systemic inflammation and altered pain behavior, fitting the SASP-driven inflammaging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights bidirectional crosstalk between inflammaging and hallmarks like cellular senescence and mitochondrial dysfunction, with SASP as a key driver.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on cellular senescence and NF-κB signaling driving neuroinflammation and cognitive decline, central to SASP-mediated inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes senescent cells and SASP as sources of pro-inflammatory factors, with NF-κB and inflammasome pathways linking innate immunity and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Identifies SASP and NLRP3 inflammasome activation as main origins of inflammaging in cardiovascular aging, fitting SASP-driven inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links macrophage dysregulation, cellular senescence, and mitochondrial dysfunction as interconnected drivers of inflammaging, emphasizing SASP.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging-driven bone loss mediated by inflammatory cytokines, many of which are SASP components, linking SASP to osteoporosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Dysregulation and Vascular Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on immune homeostasis imbalance, oxidative stress, and vascular dysfunction driving inflammaging and age-related vascular diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Dysregulation and Vascular Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes pro- and anti-inflammatory cytokines in vascular aging and endothelial dysfunction, fitting vascular inflammaging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on lifelong antigenic exposure, immune remodeling, and immunosenescence as drivers of inflammaging and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes immune system remodeling, balance of pro- and anti-inflammatory responses, and genetic/environmental modulation of inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial dysfunction-driven inflammaging with immunosenescence, Treg dysfunction, and myeloid-derived suppressor cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links chronic inflammation to immune aging via PRR signaling, NF-κB regulation, and telomere shortening causing immunosenescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Connects elevated pro-inflammatory cytokines to aging outcomes, highlighting immune system trade-offs and systemic inflammation burden.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on altered inflammatory gene expression rhythms and immune dysregulation in brain and blood with aging, reflecting immune remodeling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging in male reproductive tract with immune cell changes and proinflammatory cytokines, fitting immune remodeling theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights immunosenescence and neuroimmune interactions causing brain inflammation and cognitive decline, fitting immune remodeling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes mitochondrial ROS, oxidative stress, and genetic control of cytokines linking mitochondrial dysfunction to inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes multiple sources including mitochondrial dysfunction and metabolic inflammation contributing to inflammaging and cancer.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on molecular mechanisms including oxidative stress and mitochondrial dysfunction promoting inflammaging, accelerated by spaceflight.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes immunometabolic regulation, macrophage polarization, and autophagy affecting inflammaging, linking metabolism and mitochondrial function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and Oxidative Stress-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Combines inflammaging with metabolic inflammation and gut dysbiosis, highlighting mitochondrial and metabolic contributions.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Cytoplasmic DNA-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on cytoplasmic and cell-free DNA biochemical changes triggering innate immunity and inflammaging, linked to telomere shortening.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging as adaptive remodeling with balance of pro- and anti-inflammatory mediators, fitting immune remodeling theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links myeloid-derived suppressor cells expansion and chronic inflammation to bone fragility, fitting immune remodeling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Psychosocial Stress and Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on psychosocial stressors like intimate partner violence elevating inflammation and accelerating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes cytokine network balance between inflammaging and anti-inflammaging in longevity, fitting immune remodeling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Cytoplasmic DNA-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes DNA damage accumulation in stem cell niche triggering cytokine secretion and inflammaging propagation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunosenescence and Immune Remodeling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes monocyte-driven inflammaging causing intestinal barrier dysfunction, fitting immune remodeling and inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Secretory Phenotype (SASP) Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on microglial senescence and SASP secretion propagating brain inflammaging, fitting SASP-driven inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and Cytoplasmic DNA-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links gut microbiota dysbiosis and inflammaging cytokines to impaired DNA damage repair, emphasizing DNA damage and inflammation.
